channel.title: Z508 Client
channel.description: I was using a custom z508 client. I wanted to add godwars to server, i used ::tele to the coordinates, when i got their, bandos started attacking me and my client just closed so fast that i didnt even see it close. It also happen when i was in the wilderness when reverant dragon attacked me, it closed. i thought it was the mapdata. I got an error in the run client.bat. but i cant copy or take screeny cz it closes fast. Anyway to fix it?

item.title: Z508 Client
item.dc:creator: @sonicforce41 sonicforce41
item.description:
@sonicforce41 wrote:

I was using a custom z508 client. I wanted to add godwars to server, i used ::tele to the coordinates, when i got their, bandos started attacking me and my client just closed so fast that i didnt even see it close. It also happen when i was in the wilderness when reverant dragon attacked me, it closed. i thought it was the mapdata. I got an error in the run client.bat. but i cant copy or take screeny cz it closes fast.
Anyway to fix it?

Read full topic
